channel.title: No Doors/Gates
channel.description: Is there anyway to make moparscape to have no doors/gates so you dont need open them because i can't open the doors/gates in some places of the map so i cant get in to some buildings which is really annoying. Plz help.

item.title: No Doors/Gates
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

after u do the ::setobject then you have to logout then in to see the changes…

Read full topic

item.title: No Doors/Gates
item.dc:creator: @Raiko Raiko
item.description:
@Raiko wrote:

[quote=“tobias222, post:2, topic:120617”]to get into some buildings without opening the doors type ::noclip and walk through them , or you can ::setobject DOORID DOORID becauuse some doors are already open or u can change the door id to the ob id of grass cause u can walk on it,[/quote]I tried the ::setobject but it dosn’t do anything. It just changes the doors name and its still closed. I can’t us ::noclip or else people on my server will start walking through anything.

Read full topic

item.title: No Doors/Gates
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

to get into some buildings without opening the doors type ::noclip and walk through them , or you can ::setobject DOORID DOORID becauuse some doors are already open or u can change the door id to the ob id of grass cause u can walk on it,

Read full topic
